name: acro-bike
effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  Slower than the mach bike.  Can perform various tricks, allowing the trainer to reach certain special areas.
short_effect: More maneuverable than the Mach Bike, and allows hopping along rails.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A folding bicycle
capable of jumps
and wheelies.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A folding bicycle
capable of jumps
and wheelies.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A folding bicycle that is capable
of stunts like jumps and wheelies.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This folding Bike allows you to perform actions
such as wheelies and bunny hops.
